title: Hellsing Ultimate OVA dual-audio ENG/JAP
description:
Hellsing Ultimate OVA dual-audio ENG/JAP 

So,I had all these specs and crap and even some witty, self-deprecating jokes written out buuuut they're gone. Not gonna lie; it's my fault for pressing the wrong key (wen I should have pressed the correct key! DUH)

Soooooo it's Hellsing, it's the more recently translated dual audio OVA sets, and 'nuff said.

But- More said. Sorry! I can only take credit for compiling this into one set. Didn't really do any of the work at all so thanks a million to the people who did the ACTUAL work whose names I can't remember I'm reallyreally sorry! One more thing.  


 * Video Format: MPEG-4(h264) [but they're mkv files so sorrrrryyy!! AGAIN!]
 Aspect Ration: 1280x720 & FPS: 23.97616 (24ish)
 * Audio Format: MPEG AAC (mp4a)
Spoken Languages: English, Japanese
5.1 [6 channel]
Sample Rate: 96000 Hz
 * Subtitles: English

Is it done?


DUH!

Contents:

Hellsing Ultimate OVA 05.mkv   0.8447 GB
Hellsing Ultimate OVA 06.mkv   0.9576 GB
Hellsing Ultimate OVA 07.mkv   1.05 GB  
Hellsing Ultimate OVA 08.mkv   2.07 GB  

Totaling: 4.9223 GB
